title: Bighorn Canyon National Recreation Area: Lost And Found Policy
body: Lost And Found Policy       Lost & Found Property Did you lose or misplace any items while visiting Bighorn Canyon National Recreation Area?  For items lost in the North District (Fort Smith, Montana) call: (406) 666-2452. For all other lost items call: (307) 548-5406 (Lovell, Wyoming).   Please take found items to the Afterbay Contact Station at Fort Smith, Montana or the Bighorn Canyon Visitor Center at Lovell, Wyoming. You are invited to make a lost property report by sending us the following information:  name mailing address telephone number item lost description of item lost with name of manufacturer, model number, color, and any specifics that will help us identify your property date lost where you believe the item was lost  Email this information to e-mail us. Or, if you wish to leave a report in person, come to: North District - Afterbay Contact Station at Fort Smith, Montana South District - Bighorn Canyon Visitor Center at Lovell, Wyoming. . Or write us at: Lost and Found Office, Bighorn Canyon National Recreation Area, 5 Avenue B, P.O. Box 7458, Fort Smith, MT 59035.
